title: Large 2BR with Parking, Storage Space, Shared Laundry, Bike Storage
posting_body: Click or Copy and paste the URL below into a new browser window to view the Virtual Tour.
Zillow: Please click on the “Facts and Features” section to view Virtual 3D Tour.
• Pets: 2 pets max, 25lbs or less, $25/mo/pet, unless certified ESA or support animal.
This building is ideally located near Forest Knolls.
Escape to Mount Sutro Forest right next door for an enjoyable day in the outdoors, or drive up to the Sutro Tower, only minutes away, for a breathtaking panoramic view of the city.
On top of that, there are a bountiful of restaurants and shops lined up on Judah and Irving st, which are a couple of blocks distance.
7th street grants access to several Muni Bus stops that can take you all over the city.
Income: 3x the Rent for aggregate household income
Lease Term: One year, month to month after
Security Deposit: 2X the rent (no deposit option for qualified renters <URL>)
Lease Terms: One year, month to month after
Resident Benefit Package included and required with all leases ($49.50/mo)
KeyOpp is a Family Owned and Community Focused Property Management Company providing the best experience for both our Residents and our Clients.
We have a keen understanding of the importance of balancing and maintaining healthy relationships with our Resident community while also ensuring an effective return for the Real Estate Investment.

Disclaimer: Application fees are non-refundable and submission of an application is not a guarantee of leasing the property.
Applications are processed on FIFO and approval is contingent upon minimum qualification requirements and earliest move-in date.
